header.title: Zad AI Studio
header.subtitle: Your AI-powered studio for creating faith-based content.

morning.title: Good Morning! ‚òÄÔ∏è
morning.desc: Start your day with Morning Adhkar and spiritual reflections.

friday.title: Blessed Friday üïå
friday.desc: Remind your followers to read Surah Al-Kahf and send prayers.

evening.title: Quiet Night üåô
evening.desc: Create a peaceful bedtime story or Witr prayer reminder.

creatorStudio.title: Content Creation Studio
creatorStudio.description: Generate scripts, create visuals, add voiceovers, and produce your video content.

myProjects.title: My Projects
myProjects.description: Access, manage, and continue working on all your saved projects.

scheduler.description: Schedule and automate future content generation.

liveStream.description: Broadcast to YouTube, Facebook, TikTok, and more.

community.title: Zad Community
community.description: Explore inspiring projects from other creators and remix their templates.

hero.title: Premium Creative Tools
hero.desc: Level up your content with exclusive templates, 4K backgrounds, and professionally designed avatars.

ramadan2025.title: Ramadan 2025 Pack
ramadan2025.desc: Video templates and scripts ready for the holy month.

newsOpener.title: News Opener
newsOpener.desc: Professional intro for breaking news and serious content.

wiseScholar.title: The Scholar (Avatar)
wiseScholar.desc: 3D character of a wise man for storytelling.

cinematicPack.title: Cinematic FX
cinematicPack.desc: Audio library for dramatic effects and scores.

global_voice.title: Global Voice
global_voice.desc: Created content that speaks to the world (Cultural Bridges)

peace_builder.title: Peace Builder
peace_builder.desc: Created content that corrects misconceptions or builds bridges

docs.title: Documentation & Guide
docs.subtitle: Comprehensive guide for all features and stability instructions

tutorialVideo.title: Watch the Magic Happen!
tutorialVideo.desc: Want to see this app explain itself? Click below to let the AI generate a full, high-energy promo video showcasing all features right before your eyes.

generator.title: 1. Smart Content Generator
generator.desc: Choose a content category (Faith, Education, Marketing). AI (Gemini 2.5) generates a full script including title, scenes, hashtags, and tips.

editor.title: 2. Comprehensive Editor
editor.desc: Edit generated text, translate to multiple languages, and create interactive audience quizzes.

video.title: 3. Client-Side Video Engine
video.desc: Create videos directly in your browser without external servers. Choose between 'Slideshow' or 'Avatar Presenter' styles.

live.title: 4. Live Streaming Hub
live.desc: Manage YouTube streams via API or get RTMP settings for Facebook and TikTok.

rendering.title: Critical Note on Video Generation
rendering.desc: Video creation happens *locally* on your device using Canvas & MediaRecorder. This consumes RAM/CPU. You MUST keep the tab open and active during generation to prevent stopping.

api.desc: Uses Google Gemini API for text/image generation. Ensure your API key is valid.

audio.desc: Uses Web Audio API to mix voiceover and background music seamlessly.

deployment.intro: How to publish this application to the web (for developers).
deployment.buildDesc: This creates a 'dist' folder ready for upload.
deployment.hostingDesc: You can deploy the 'dist' folder to any static hosting service.

crash.title: App Crash / White Screen
crash.desc: If the app stops suddenly, it's usually browser memory exhaustion during high-res video processing.
crash.tip3: Use Chrome or Edge for best performance.

generation.title: Generation Fails Repeatedly
generation.desc: If generation fails, check your internet connection and wait a minute before retrying (to avoid Google API rate limits).

welcomeScreen.subtitle: Your comprehensive tool for creating, editing, producing, and publishing inspiring Islamic content, all in one place.

loginModal.title: Login (Optional)
loginModal.subtitle: Save your settings and continue your work easily.

feedbackModal.title: Improve the App!
feedbackModal.subtitle: Have an idea or a suggestion? Let us know! Our AI assistant will review your feedback.

deployModal.title: Deploy Application
deployModal.subtitle: This will start the process of packaging and deploying the application for production use.
deployModal.successMessage: The application has been successfully deployed and is now live.
deployModal.developerNote: Have the source code? Learn how to do a real deployment:

studioManager.title: My Projects Studio
studioManager.noProjects: You have no saved projects yet. Go to the 'Generator' to create new content!
studioManager.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to permanently delete this project?
studioManager.loadProjectTooltip: Load this project into the editor

generatorControls.title: Choose the Content Type for Today

contentEditor.title: Content Editor
contentEditor.placeholderTitle: Start by selecting a source from the right panel (Generator or Libraries) to begin creating your content.
contentEditor.audioElementNotSupported: Your browser does not support the audio element.
contentEditor.copyTooltip: Copy the title, script, and hashtags to your clipboard.
contentEditor.exportTooltip: Download the script as a .txt file.
contentEditor.deleteTooltip: Clear the current content and start over.
contentEditor.generateAudioTooltip: Generate a full audio story (for audio-only content types).
contentEditor.generateQuizTooltip: Generate a multiple-choice question based on the content to engage your audience.

publishingPanel.title: Video & Publishing Tools
publishingPanel.placeholderTitle: Once content is generated, video creation tools will appear here.

storyboard.title: Video Storyboard
storyboard.uploadTooltip: Upload your own image for this scene.

slideshow.title: Step 1: Visuals
slideshow.generateAllTooltip: Generate an AI image for every scene based on its text and visual suggestion.
slideshow.regenerateAllTooltip: Regenerate all scene images. This will replace existing ones.

avatar.title: Step 1: Design Avatar
avatar.promptLabel: Describe the character you want (e.g., a wise man with a white beard)
avatar.generateTooltip: Generate an AI avatar based on your description.
avatar.removeBgTooltip: Automatically remove the background from the avatar image.
avatar.saveToLibraryTooltip: Save the current avatar to your personal library for future use.
avatar.visualPreviewTooltip: Generate a static image preview of how the avatar, background, and text will look together.
avatar.sharePreviewTitle: Visual Preview from Zad AI Studio

audio.generateTooltip: Generate an AI voiceover from the script

music.title: Step 3: Background Music
music.promptLabel: Describe the mood for the music (e.g., spiritual, calm, hopeful)
music.generateTooltip: Generate AI background music based on the prompt
music.shareTitle: Background music from Zad AI Studio

final.previewTooltip: Generate a silent video preview with just the images and text.
final.createTooltip: Combine images, voiceover, and music into the final video.

videoPlayer.title: Your Video is Ready!

shareFallback.alert: Video info copied to clipboard! You can now paste it and upload your video.
shareFallback.notSupported: Sharing is not supported on this browser.

shareHelpText.native: Share video and text to other apps.

videoPlayer.shareTooltip: Share the video and text to social media

hadithLibrary.noBookmarks: You haven't bookmarked any hadiths yet.

quranLibrary.searchPlaceholder: Search in verse text or number...

scheduler.title: Scheduled Task Manager
scheduler.noJobs: No scheduled tasks. You can schedule content from the "Content Generator" section.

scheduleModal.title: Schedule Content: {{label}}
scheduleModal.description: Choose the date and time for the content to be generated automatically.
scheduleModal.errorDateInPast: The schedule date must be in the future.

liveStream.title: YouTube Live Stream Management
liveStream.signInPrompt: Please sign in with your Google account to authorize management of your YouTube channel's live streams.
liveStream.selectBroadcastPrompt: Select a broadcast from the list to see its details.

streamingHub.title: {{platform}} Stream Setup
streamingHub.instructions: Go to your {{platform}} Live Dashboard to get your credentials. Copy your Server URL and Stream Key, then paste them below and save for easy access next time.

steps.1: Copy the Server URL and Stream Key from above.
steps.2: Open your streaming software (e.g., OBS Studio, Streamlabs, vMix).
steps.5: Paste the Server URL and Stream Key into their respective fields.
steps.6: Save settings and click Start Streaming in your software.
steps.7: Your stream will appear on {{platform}} within seconds.

streamingHub.noCredentials: No credentials saved for this platform yet.

error.loadFailed: Failed to load broadcast list. You may need to re-authenticate.
error.noStreamBound: No associated stream found. This may be an old broadcast.
error.transitionFailed: Failed to change broadcast status to {{status}}.
error.authFailed: Authentication expired. Please sign in again.

featureDisabled.title: YouTube API Not Configured
featureDisabled.description: The YouTube integration requires an API Key. You can still use manual RTMP setups for all platforms.
featureDisabled.howToActivate: To activate this feature, the administrator must configure the YouTube API Client ID and API Key.

subscription.title: Choose Your Plan
subscription.subtitle: Unlock the full power of AI content creation.

enterprise.title: Have a Partner Code?
enterprise.desc: If you are part of a partner organization, enter your voucher code below to unlock premium features.

installGuide.title: Install Zad AI Studio
installGuide.description: To get the best experience and offline access, install this web application to your device.
installGuide.desktopStep1: Click the install icon in the browser address bar (top right).
installGuide.desktopStep2: Or click the three dots menu > 'Install Zad AI Studio'.
installGuide.iosStep1: Tap the 'Share' button in Safari's menu bar.
installGuide.iosStep2: Scroll down and tap 'Add to Home Screen'.
installGuide.iosStep3: Tap 'Add' in the top right corner.
installGuide.androidStep2: Tap 'Install App' or 'Add to Home screen'.
